## Visual 1

```{r}
top25 <- survivalists |>
  filter(days_lasted >= quantile(days_lasted, 0.75))

top25_loadouts <- inner_join(loadouts, top25, by = c("name" = "name")) 
  # |>
  # select(name, item) |>
  # group_by(item) |>
  # summarise(count = n()) |>
  # arrange(desc(count)) |>
  # mutate(item = fct_reorder(item, count)) 

ggplot(top25_loadouts, aes(x = item)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "Popular Items Among Top Survivors", x = "Item", y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 25) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
